title: IBrokenOutSectionFeatureData.IGetSketchSegment
description: Gets the sketch segments that form the border of this broken-out section feature.
returns: In-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of ISketchSegment s VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
To get the sketch segments that form the border of this broken-out section feature:
Set the property
IBrokenOutSectionFeatureData::EditSketch
to true.
Call
IBrokenOutSectionFeatureData::GetSketchSegmentCount
to set the value of this method's Count parameter.
Call this method.
